children.name: common:1.16.1
children.description: A Library Helm Chart for grouping common logic between bitnami charts. This chart is not deployable by itself.

name: wavefront-hpa-adapter:1.2.5
description: Wavefront HPA Adapter for Kubernetes is a Kubernetes Horizontal Pod Autoscaler adapter. It allows to scale your Kubernetes workloads based on Wavefront metrics.
